entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
